channel.title: CVE Feed for Nvidia Corporation -- Some NVIDIA Tegra Mobile Processors
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Nvidia Corporation -- Some NVIDIA Tegra Mobile Processors

item.title: CVE-2018-6242|2024-09-16T16:53:48.144Z -- nvidia%20corporation -- some%20nvidia%20tegra%20mobile%20processors
item.description: Some NVIDIA Tegra mobile processors released prior to 2016 contain a buffer overflow vulnerability in BootROM Recovery Mode (RCM). An attacker with physical access to the device's USB and the ability to force the device to reboot into RCM could exploit the vulnerability to execute unverified code.
